description:
POST  v2/{tenant_id}/flavors/{flavor_id}/os-extra_specs  gives response 500 instead of 404.

With Post_Body : {"extra_specs": "ksr"}, the actual result is 
{"computeFault": {"message": "The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation.", "code": 500}}
when the expected result should be a 404.

Extra specs is suppose to be a list of keys. If I input with {"extra_specs": {"ksr": "ksr"}}, I would get 404. However, there should be a check to make sure the extra_specs value was a set and raised a 4xx HTTP error when it wasn't, rather than hitting an unexpected condition and raising 5xx
title: API set_flavor_extra_spec_with_all_invalid  gives response 500 instead of 404
